content: 36 r12 single_crochet around 36 r13 single_crochet 4 decrease 6x 30 r14 single_crochet around 30 r15 single_crochet 3 decrease 24 r16-18 single_crochet around 24 fo and hide tail inside the flattened piece @ c r o c h e t j o l l y s e c o n d w i n g & j o i n i n g repeat steps for first wing to make the second wing but do not fo make sure working yarn is on the corner of the work and hold the two pieces together crochet the second wing to the first wing by single crocheting through all stitches on each side leave a long tail to sew to body @ c r o c h e t j o l l y a n t e n n a e chain 9 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook 2 half_double_crochet in the next 6 sts leave tails to sew to head a s s e m b l y 1 sew arms to body between rounds 15-16 2 sew wings centered onto back and neck of the body 3 sew antennae to head around rounds 28-30 @ c r o c h e t j o l l y a l l d o n e @ c r o c h e t j o l l y y a r n v a r i a t i o n s f o r c o m p a r i s o n 5 bulky velvet yarn 4mm hook 4 worsted-aran yarn 3mm hook @ c r o c h e t j o l l y
